lead_paragraph: Mr. Hollein, director of the Städel Museum in Frankfurt, will oversee the de Young Museum in and the Legion of Honor in San Francisco starting June 1.

headline.print_headline: San Francisco Museums Name New Director
headline.main: Fine Arts Museums in San Francisco Picks Max Hollein as Next Director

snippet: Mr. Hollein, director of the Städel Museum in Frankfurt, will oversee the de Young Museum in and the Legion of Honor in San Francisco starting June 1.
abstract: Fine Arts Museums of San Francisco names Max Hollein from Stadel Museum in Frankfurt as new director.
